iti92:2.1: “Saṅghāṭikaṇṇe cepi, bhikkhave, bhikkhu gahetvā piṭṭhito piṭṭhito anubandho assa pāde pādaṁ nikkhipanto,
iti92:2.2: so ca hoti abhijjhālu kāmesu tibbasārāgo byāpannacitto paduṭṭhamanasaṅkappo muṭṭhassati asampajāno asamāhito vibbhantacitto pākatindriyo;
iti92:2.3: atha kho so ārakāva mayhaṁ, ahañca tassa.
iti92:2.5: Dhammañhi so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na passati.
iti92:3.1: Yojanasate cepi so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vihareyya.
iti92:3.2: So ca hoti anabhijjhālu kāmesu na tibbasārāgo abyāpannacitto apaduṭṭhamanasaṅkappo upaṭṭhitassati sampajāno samāhito ekaggacitto saṁvutindriyo;
iti92:3.3: atha kho so santikeva mayhaṁ, ahañca tassa.
iti92:7.1: Ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti.
